Package ReactorEE.simulator

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameInit
    GameInit class bootstraps the entire game.
    GUIRefresher  
    MultiplayerStepLooper  
    PlantController
    PlantController is the "controller" of the MVC design of the game.
    ReactorUtils
    ReactorUtils contains utilities for the game such as: - Return a fresh Plant Object, fully initialised.
    SinglePlayerInit
    Initializes all the features needed to play a single player game.
    StepLooper
    Step Looper provides the automatic stepping functionality to the game.
    TextUI
    This class is used in the team's implementation of a text based game.
    UIData
    UIData holds all data necessary for a UI (both text and graphical based).
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PlantController.falableComponents
    List of the components within the plant that can be manually broken.
